About.paragraph: The significant revolution of blockchain and machine learning is transforming the recent digitalization era to the next stage of autonomous decision-making. Throughout my research on machine learning-based demand forecasting, the significant result proved the potential evolution of artificial intelligence to apply to industrial processes and the capability to integrate into various domains. Meanwhile, the crucial roles of blockchain focusing on security and privacy leverage the machine learning outcome toward a fully automated production.
work: Research Assistant, Convergence Lab of Human Factors and Artificial Intelligence
Cooperate Account Manager, South East Asia Telecom
program: KF Korea Workshop: EAI ACE CHALLENGE
National CISCO ICT Education and Technology
award: [2018-2021] Global Korea Scholarship Program for Graduate Degrees

Features.title: Thesis of Master of Science
Features.text: Demand Forecasting of a First-Tier Supplier in Automotive Industry Using Nonlinear Autoregressive Network with Parsimonious Variables

Features.title: 2020 Fall Conference of the Korean Society of Industrial Engineers
Features.text: Demand Forecasting of a First-Tier Supplier in Automotive Industry Using Nonlinear Autoregressive Network with Parsimonious Variables

Features.title: TensorFlow Developer Certificate
Features.text: Understanding of building TensorFlow models using Computer Vision, Convolutional Neural Networks, Natural Language Processing, and real-world image data and strategies

Project.title: GISTSWAP, Decentralized Finance (DEFI)
Project.text: Decentralized finance (DEFI) aims to provide a decentralized exchange (DEX) platform with a secure and low transaction fee under the Ethereum network

Project.title: Decentralized Finance as a Decentralized Application – Yield Farming
Project.text: A decentralized application (DAPP) with custom personalized token functions for yield farming, staking, and rewarding in certain events

Project.title: NFT Marketplace on a Blockchain Network
Project.text: A non-fungible token (NFT) marketplace for minting NFTs allows users to own their minted tokens on the market’s smart contract under the Ethereum network

Project.title: Automatic Ovako Working-Posture Analysis System application using deep learning
Project.text: Working posture assessment is a required obligation for industries to meet respective employees’ safety standard policy in a country. OWAS, a common assessment method, has analyzed workers’ postures related to work-related musculoskeletal disorders (WMSDs). The assessment is done by determining a score representing a level of risk factors

Project.title: Demand forecasting of a first-tier supplier in the automotive industry using a nonlinear autoregressive network with parsimonious variables
Project.text: To respond to its demand fluctuation, a first-tier supplier should accurately predict supply on time for lean or just-in-time manufacturing. Overproduction due to inaccurate prediction causes a carrying cost by holding unnecessary stock in inventory. Meanwhile, underproduction causes stock out that probably causes additional direct and indirect costs

Project.title: Autonomous Driving Lane Detection
Project.text: Opencv library is used for image processing. The initialed image which is RGB in 3 channels is converted to a grayscale image as 1 channel [0, 255]. The image noise can create fault edges leading to uncertain edge detection
